channel.title: 317 shops are being so gay
channel.description:
When i try add some items to a shop i keep getting an error when i try login. Im trying to add it on to that. any ideas why it says [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang number format exception for input string:100 3637 100 exception for input string<unknown source> ect..[/code]
[code]shop = 1 PVP_Point_Exchange 2 2 15101 100 3101 100 6384 100 6587 100 6570 100 6577 100 2904 100 2621 100 15000 100 8765 100 6583 100 [/code]
